e2eff95d-49ee-47ea-b350-d53a5306fefc KHNP touts i-SMR to international audienceKorea Hydro & Nuclear Power has used the <em>第 28 届联合国气候变化大会 (COP28) 在阿联酋迪拜举行，推出全新创新 SMR 技术及其 i-SMR 驱动的智能零网城市模型。该公司已同意与印度尼西亚和约旦合作伙伴合作调查 i-SMR 装置的部署。; Mon, 04 Dec 2023 15:23:41 GMT https://www.world-nuclear-news.org/Articles/KHNP-touts-i-SMR-to-international-audience?feed=feed
09fb8974-5d57-418f-9101-06c0d7f2b7c5 ENEC and Kazatomprom sign commerical uranium contractKazakhstan’s Kazatomprom has signed its first commercial uranium fuel supply contract with the Emirates Nuclear Energy Corporation, for the United Arab Emirates' Barakah nuclear power plant. Mon, 04 Dec 2023 15:11:56 GMT https://www.world-nuclear-news.org/Articles/ENEC-and-Kazatomprom-sign-commerical-uranium-contr?feed=feed
d9ca75f7-f061-49df-88de-a74c3260e979 Further interest in Steady Energy SMR for district heatingSteady Energy - Finnish developer of the LDR-50 small modular reactor - has signed a letter of intent with municipal energy company Kuopion Energia that includes an option for the construction of up to five district heating reactors starting in 2030. Mon, 04 Dec 2023 12:47:11 GMT https://www.world-nuclear-news.org/Articles/Further-interest-in-Steady-Energy-SMR-for-district?feed=feed
c26c6f00-a86c-47dd-a744-9ef9643e4dd6 Zaporizhzhia nuclear plant suffers eighth power blackoutThe Zaporizhzhia nuclear power plant lost off-site power for the first time since May, and had to rely on emergency diesel generators for nearly five hours at the weekend, prompting renewed safety concerns amid the on-going war. Mon, 04 Dec 2023 12:46:24 GMT https://www.world-nuclear-news.org/Articles/Zaporizhzhia-nuclear-plant-suffers-eighth-power-bl?feed=feed
2464277a-d286-4976-bcc5-9bbfe6825b80 Ministerial declaration puts nuclear at heart of climate actionTwenty two countries have signed up to the goal of tripling global nuclear energy capacity by 2050, at the UN's COP28 climate change conference. Fri, 01 Dec 2023 16:19:59 GMT https://www.world-nuclear-news.org/Articles/Ministerial-declaration-puts-nuclear-at-heart-of-c?feed=feed
ce72e4e9-39cb-4afb-9964-c4a92b209c05 Indian unit reaches construction milestoneHot conditioning of unit 7 at the Rajasthan Atomic Power Plant has been completed, Nuclear Power Corporation of India Ltd has announced. The unit is the third in a series of indigenously designed 700 MWe pressurised heavy water reactors. Fri, 01 Dec 2023 16:08:31 GMT https://www.world-nuclear-news.org/Articles/Indian-unit-reaches-construction-milestone?feed=feed
9ffb0ceb-55f6-411a-a908-867152b870ae Contract awarded for construction of Shin Hanul 3 and 4A consortium led by Hyundai Engineering & Construction has been selected by Korea Hydro & Nuclear Power as the contractor for the construction of the main facilities at units 3 and 4 of the Shin Hanul nuclear power plant. Fri, 01 Dec 2023 12:29:31 GMT https://www.world-nuclear-news.org/Articles/Contract-awarded-for-construction-of-Shin-Hanul-3?feed=feed
563bb4bd-9a3e-4dc9-85fe-d57ff5c6bc86 Texas uranium operation returns to productionUranium production has begun at enCore Energy Corp's South Texas Rosita Central Processing Plant (CPP). The restart of the plant which last produced yellowcake in 2008 is the first step in enCore's South Texas in-situ leach uranium production pipeline strategy. Fri, 01 Dec 2023 15:23:28 GMT https://www.world-nuclear-news.org/Articles/Texas-uranium-operation-returns-to-production?feed=feed
4ecda229-bab3-432f-8b8e-83da21dc3a95 Japan and EU mark first plasma from JT-60SA fusion deviceThe successful operation of the Japan Torus-60 Super Advanced fusion device, the world's largest operational superconducting tokamak, has been marked by Japan and the European Union in a ceremony to inaugurate the facility. Fri, 01 Dec 2023 13:42:50 GMT https://www.world-nuclear-news.org/Articles/Japan-and-EU-mark-first-plasma-from-JT-60SA-fusion?feed=feed
a018c095-c0bb-4067-b318-f24a4ec6a93b Nuclear energy no longer a taboo, WNE hearsMuch progress has been made over recent years in the representation of nuclear in national, regional and international debates on energy and the climate, speakers agreed at the opening session of the <em>本周在巴黎举行的世界核展览。; Fri, 01 Dec 2023 16:48:47 GMT https://www.world-nuclear-news.org/Articles/Nuclear-energy-no-longer-a-taboo,-WNE-hears?feed=feed
c2270561-e960-4875-b761-bb2089af6ad7 SMR fuel supply chain grows as agreements signedOntario Power Generation has selected suppliers Cameco, Urenco USA, Orano and Global Nuclear Fuel-Americas for the first fuel contracts for its planned small modular reactor units at the Darlington New Nuclear Project, while TerraPower and uranium producer Uranium Energy Corp are to work together on the fuel supply chain ahead of the construction of the first-of-a-kind Natrium plant. Thu, 30 Nov 2023 15:12:15 GMT https://www.world-nuclear-news.org/Articles/SMR-fuel-supply-chain-grows-as-agreements-signed?feed=feed
